description: Optimized for vocal clarity and intelligibility. Focuses on boosting the mid-range while cutting distracting low-end rumble and high-end hiss.

bands.notes: Strong cut to remove low-frequency rumble, air conditioning noise, and mic handling noise.
Moderate cut to eliminate plosives ('P' and 'B' sounds) and deep chest resonance that can sound 'muddy'.
Neutral or slightly cut; this is the very bottom of the male voice fundamental frequency.
Small boost to add fullness and warmth to voices without becoming boomy.
Moderate boost for the core body and loudness of the voice.
Strong boost for **clarity and nasal presence**, the primary range for vocal intelligibility.
Small boost to help voices cut through and maintain presence.
Neutral, or slightly cut. Contains sibilance (sharp 'S' and 'T' sounds).
Slight cut to reduce microphone hiss and sharp sibilance/breaths that can be distracting.
Moderate cut to eliminate high-end noise/hiss, as no useful vocal information exists here.
